Text: When he comes to his senses, Cid is surrounded by darkness.

No matter how much he strains his eyes, the
blackness extends on forever.

Something floats in the lightless abyss that distorts
one's sense of direction and makes even the self
grow faint.
It is a grotesque left arm all bound in chains.
The chains break.
Now free, the arm reaches out to grab Cid.
He readies his sword for a fight,
but then everything...
is consumed by light.
Mm...

There is no sign of the arm anywhere. Cid squints in
the bright morning sun.
I see you can survive even a stab through the heart.

Yeah, I shifted it out of the way with magic, but
it took a lot outta me.
You're full of surprises. Much more than I am...

From where she is seated beside Cid, Aurora reaches
over to touch his wound.
No blood sticks to her hand.

In fact, her hand passes right through Cid, unable to
touch him.
*sigh*
You're vanishing.
It seems that way.

The two of them sit enjoying the beautiful morning.
The dew shines and sparkles.

I'm the one who called you here. I apologize for
deceiving you.
It's okay.
There's something else I lied about.
It's okay.
I had hoped to disappear long before this.
I wanted to forget everything.
But now I have one memory I don't want to lose.

Even if I do fade to nothingness, I want to hold onto
this, at least.
Aurora smiles.
Thank you for the precious experience.
Likewise. I had fun, too.
And then she begins to disappear.
There is sadness in her forced smile.
If by chance you happen upon the real me...
Please...

Aurora places her hand to Cid's cheek as she speaks.
But...he can no longer see her.

There is no longer anyone there, and the calm
morning continues.
"Please kill me," huh...?
Cid can still feel her warmth beside him.
The Sanctuary was destroyed.
Did you recover the sacred sword?
It vanished without a trace.
What about samples of the core?
The core also vanished.
The simplest, most decisive solution. Very like him.
Only Master Shadow could pull it off.
There is pride in Epsilon's voice.
His path is the one we must take.
And what of Beta?

She's still working her way into the princesses'
graces. If all goes off without hitch, no one will
suspect her presence.
So it's going well?
Yes. And as for that other matter...
It appears the legends were true.
Aurora the Calamity Witch...
is also known as the demon Diablos.
I see... That's why he...
Another piece of the puzzle clicks into place.

Our next stage is the royal capital. Be diligent in
your preparations.
Understood. Shall I report to Master Shadow?
No need. He already knows all.
